languages.text: "Верно. Прямо в нервные узлы". {n}Друкари склоняет голову набок, его голос обретает бархатные ноты — он смакует каждое слово.{/n} "Прямая стимуляция триггерных зон, вызывающая постоянную, неослабевающую боль. Знаешь ли ты, какое наслаждение испытываешь, когда твое страдание звенит в унисон с чужим? Какой экстаз преисполняет тебя, когда собственная агония сливается с агонией врага? Это — то, из чего соткан мой мир, {name}".

"Correct. Directly into the nerve centres." {n}The Drukhari's head falls to one side and his voice takes on a velvety undertone, as though he is savouring every word.{/n} "Direct stimulation of the trigger points, provoking constant, unrelenting pain. Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? My world is woven from that pleasure, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Прямо в нервные узлы". {n}Друкари склоняет голову набок, его голос обретает бархатные ноты — он смакует каждое слово.{/n} "Прямая стимуляция триггерных зон, вызывающая постоянную, неослабевающую боль. Знаешь ли ты, какое наслаждение испытываешь, когда твое страдание звенит в унисон с чужим? Какой экстаз преисполняет тебя, когда собственная агония сливается с агонией врага? Это — то, из чего соткан мой мир, {name}".

languages.text: “没错，直接勾在神经中枢上。”{n}玛拉斋歪过了头，声音低沉得宛如天鹅绒一般，仿佛在细细品味着每个字。{/n}“这些钩子会直接刺激触发点，激发持续不断的剧痛。当你的苦楚与他人的苦楚同时奏响时，你明白这种感觉有多令人愉悦吗？当你的剧痛与敌人的剧痛交织在一起时，你明白这会带来怎样的狂喜吗？我的世界就是由这样的快感编织而成的，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Correct. Directly into the nerve centres." {n}The Drukhari's head falls to one side and his voice takes on a velvety undertone, as though he is savouring every word.{/n} "Direct stimulation of the trigger points, provoking constant, unrelenting pain. Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? My world is woven from that pleasure, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “没错，直接勾在神经中枢上。”{n}玛拉斋歪过了头，声音低沉得宛如天鹅绒一般，仿佛在细细品味着每个字。{/n}“这些钩子会直接刺激触发点，激发持续不断的剧痛。当你的苦楚与他人的苦楚同时奏响时，你明白这种感觉有多令人愉悦吗？当你的剧痛与敌人的剧痛交织在一起时，你明白这会带来怎样的狂喜吗？我的世界就是由这样的快感编织而成的，{name}。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ご名答。神経中枢に直接ぶっ刺してる」{n}デュカーリは頭を片側に倒す。ベルベットのような低いその声は、まるで言葉をひとつひとつ噛み締めているかのようだ。{/n}「痛みに敏感なところを直接刺激して、ずっと容赦のない痛みを与える。己の苦しみが相手の苦しみと交わって響きあう気持ちよさがわかるか？己の苦しみが敵の苦しみに溶け込むときの圧倒的なエクスタシーがわかるか？俺様の世界では、悦びが交わっているんだ、{name}」
languages.original_text: "Correct. Directly into the nerve centres." {n}The Drukhari's head falls to one side and his voice takes on a velvety undertone, as though he is savouring every word.{/n} "Direct stimulation of the trigger points, provoking constant, unrelenting pain. Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? My world is woven from that pleasure, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「ご名答。神経中枢に直接ぶっ刺してる」{n}デュカーリは頭を片側に倒す。ベルベットのような低いその声は、まるで言葉をひとつひとつ噛み締めているかのようだ。{/n}「痛みに敏感なところを直接刺激して、ずっと容赦のない痛みを与える。己の苦しみが相手の苦しみと交わって響きあう気持ちよさがわかるか？己の苦しみが敵の苦しみに溶け込むときの圧倒的なエクスタシーがわかるか？俺様の世界では、悦びが交わっているんだ、{name}」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Correcto. Directamente en los centros nerviosos». {n}La cabeza del drukhari se inclina a un lado y su voz adquiere un tono aterciopelado, como si estuviese saboreando cada palabra.{/n} «Una estimulación directa de los puntos más sensibles que provoca un dolor constante e incesante. ¿Sabes el placer que se obtiene cuando tu sufrimiento resuena en armonía con el de otra persona? ¿El abrumador éxtasis de tu propia agonía entremezclada con la agonía de un enemigo? Mi mundo está hecho de esos placeres, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Correct. Directly into the nerve centres." {n}The Drukhari's head falls to one side and his voice takes on a velvety undertone, as though he is savouring every word.{/n} "Direct stimulation of the trigger points, provoking constant, unrelenting pain. Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? My world is woven from that pleasure, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Correcto. Directamente en los centros nerviosos». {n}La cabeza del drukhari se inclina a un lado y su voz adquiere un tono aterciopelado, como si estuviese saboreando cada palabra.{/n} «Una estimulación directa de los puntos más sensibles que provoca un dolor constante e incesante. ¿Sabes el placer que se obtiene cuando tu sufrimiento resuena en armonía con el de otra persona? ¿El abrumador éxtasis de tu propia agonía entremezclada con la agonía de un enemigo? Mi mundo está hecho de esos placeres, {name}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Elle est directement reliée à mes centres nerveux. » {n}La tête du Drukhari s'affaisse d'un côté et sa voix prend des accents veloutés, comme s'il savourait chaque mot.{/n} « La stimulation des terminaisons nerveuses induit une douleur permanente. Savez-vous le plaisir que l'on ressent lorsque notre souffrance résonne au diapason des tourments d'autrui ? L'indicible extase que l'on éprouve lorsque notre propre supplice se mêle à celui de notre ennemi ? Mon monde tout entier est tissé à la trame de cette folle ivresse, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Correct. Directly into the nerve centres." {n}The Drukhari's head falls to one side and his voice takes on a velvety undertone, as though he is savouring every word.{/n} "Direct stimulation of the trigger points, provoking constant, unrelenting pain. Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? My world is woven from that pleasure, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Elle est directement reliée à mes centres nerveux. » {n}La tête du Drukhari s'affaisse d'un côté et sa voix prend des accents veloutés, comme s'il savourait chaque mot.{/n} « La stimulation des terminaisons nerveuses induit une douleur permanente. Savez-vous le plaisir que l'on ressent lorsque notre souffrance résonne au diapason des tourments d'autrui ? L'indicible extase que l'on éprouve lorsque notre propre supplice se mêle à celui de notre ennemi ? Mon monde tout entier est tissé à la trame de cette folle ivresse, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Korrekt. Und sie sind direkt mit den Nervenzentren verbunden." {n}Der Kopf des Drukhari neigt sich zur Seite und seine Stimme nimmt einen samtigen Unterton an, so als würde er jedes einzelne Wort regelrecht genießen.{/n} "Direkte Stimulierung der Triggerpunkte, um ununterbrochen erbarmungslose Schmerzen hervorzurufen. Könnt Ihr Euch vorstellen, wie genussvoll es sich anfühlt, wenn sich das eigene Leiden im Einklang mit dem eines anderen befindet? Die grenzenlose Ekstase, wenn sich eigenen Qualen auf die des Feindes auswirken? Diese Freuden bilden die Quintessenz meiner Welt, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Correct. Directly into the nerve centres." {n}The Drukhari's head falls to one side and his voice takes on a velvety undertone, as though he is savouring every word.{/n} "Direct stimulation of the trigger points, provoking constant, unrelenting pain. Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? My world is woven from that pleasure, {name}."

Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? languages.text: "Evet. Direkt sinir merkezlerine bağlanıyorlar." {n}Drukhari'nin başı yana eğiliyor, sesine âdeta söylediği her kelimenin zevkine varırcasına yumuşacık bir ton hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Tetikleyici bölgelerin doğrudan uyarılması ve ardı arkası kesilmeyen, merhametsiz bir acının kışkırtıcılığı... Acının başkasınınkiyle ahenk içinde çınlayışının nasıl zevkli bir his olduğunu biliyor musun? Çektiğin ızdırabın düşmanının ızdırabına aktığı o karşı konulmayan coşkuyu peki? Benim dünyam, işte bu zevkle dokunmuştur {name}."
languages.original_text: "Correct. Directly into the nerve centres." {n}The Drukhari's head falls to one side and his voice takes on a velvety undertone, as though he is savouring every word.{/n} "Direct stimulation of the trigger points, provoking constant, unrelenting pain. Do you know how pleasurable it feels when your suffering rings out in unison with another's? The overwhelming ecstasy when your own agony bleeds into the agony of your enemy? My world is woven from that pleasure, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Doğru. Direkt sinir merkezlerine bağlanıyor." {n}Drukhari'nin başı yana eğiliyor ve sesine âdeta söylediği her kelimenin zevkine varırcasına yumuşacık bir ton hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Tetikleyici bölgelerin doğrudan uyarılması ve ardı arkası kesilmeyen, merhametsiz bir acının kışkırtıcılığı... Acının başkasınınkiyle ahenk içinde çınlayışının nasıl zevkli bir his olduğunu biliyor musun? Çektiğin ızdırabın düşmanının ızdırabına aktığı o karşı konulmayan coşkuyu peki? Benim dünyam, işte bu zevkle dokunmuştur {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
